type.name: org.gradle.testkit.runner.UnsupportedFeatureException
type.description:
Thrown when a build was executed with a target Gradle version that does not support a specific feature.
(since 2.11) (see GradleRunner#withGradleVersion(java.lang.String)) (see GradleRunner#withGradleInstallation(java.io.File)) (see GradleRunner#withGradleDistribution(java.net.URI))
